structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
General Provisions Relative To Real Property

law.catch_line: Solar Energy Systems; Installation Or Use; Restrictive Provisions
law.text: Any provision in an instrument relative to the ownership or use of real property which purports to forbid or unreasonably restrict the installation or use of a solar energy system as defined in section one A of chapter forty A or the building of structures that facilitate the collection of solar energy shall be void.
